titles.title: Redistribution of Unspent Earmarks Act of 2011
A bill to require the return and redistribution among State transportation departments of certain unexpended highway funding.
Redistribution of Unspent Earmarks Act of 2011

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Redistribution of Unspent Earmarks Act of 2011 - Requires unobligated highway project amounts made available from the Highway Trust Fund through an earmark for FY2008 or a preceding fiscal year to be: (1) returned to the transportation department of the state in which such earmarks were directed to be used, and (2) redistributed by the state for expeditious use for other federally-approved state transportation projects.
